name: GeorgeWashington'sLifeAdvice
0:
”Alexa, open George's Wisdom”
”Alexa, ask George's Wisdom for some life advice”
”Alexa, tell George's Wisdom I need some inspiration”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: george's wisdom
des:
In this new school world, sometimes you need some old school advice.

Adapted from George Washington's "Rules of Civility & Decent Behavior in Company and Conversation" – which began as a handwriting exercise that Mr. Washington completed around 1744. His source material traces back to a 16th century French etiquette manual.

Music interludes from Learning Music, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike license.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
